keyword: calories in oikos triple zero yogurt
title: Calories in Oikos Triple Zero Yogurt
meta_description: Learn calories in Oikos Triple Zero yogurt per serving, including high protein, low carbs, zero fat, and full nutrition details for better choices.
h1: Calories in Oikos Triple Zero Yogurt
assumptions: Per 5.3 oz (150g) single-serve container; non-fat Greek yogurt, vanilla flavor; no added sugar, artificial sweeteners, or fat; values based on official label.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and exact size; always check product packaging for the most accurate info.

quick_answer.text: One 150g container of Oikos Triple Zero yogurt provides 100 kcal and 15g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Oikos Triple Zero yogurt?
What's the protein in Oikos Triple Zero yogurt?
faqs.a: 15g protein per serving, making it a high-protein snack.

faqs.q: Does Oikos Triple Zero have sugar or fat?
faqs.a: Zero added sugar (5g natural sugars), zero fat, and includes 3g fiber.

faqs.q: Calories in Oikos Triple Zero per 100g?
faqs.a: Approximately 67 kcal per 100g, scaled from the 150g serving.

faqs.q: Is Oikos Triple Zero yogurt low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, only 7g carbs per container, ideal for low-carb diets.
